algorithmic.rationale: Algorithmic code (map generation, terrain processing) often requires complex logic. Higher thresholds with mandatory documentation and unit tests.

application.rationale: Application logic should remain simple and readable. Slightly higher than current for flexibility.

test.rationale: Test files often have setup complexity and multiple scenarios. Disable to avoid false positives.
requirements: Focus on test clarity over complexity metrics

other.rationale: General purpose code with moderate complexity allowance.
